title: Company sponsors Taste of the Town
title_page: Company sponsors Taste of the Town
maintext:
For five years, Martha Turner Sotheby’s International Realty has been one of the sponsors for Taste of the Town, the epicurean event held at The Woodlands Waterway Marriott Hotel.
MTSIR is proud to have a presence in The Woodlands community and to be involved with The Woodlands Chamber of Commerce, which serves as host each year.
Several Martha Turner Sotheby’s International Realty agents were on hand to give beverages and promotional items to the thousands in attendance.
Martha Turner Sotheby’s International Realty agent Cindy Lehenbauer said, “Nights like this evening ... make me love what I do. It’s not just about selling homes. It’s building relationships and meeting new people.”
